Hi there 

First title says Premium & desc. says Pro 2011 , saying about that as you'll understand why after i explain this :
Runned the exe as admin , instaled it , - had the message at the end of instal : "your free life license has been activated to comodo center etc..." then rebooted it , went to check the "about" in comodo main page , saw nothing asking about a key as it used to do before with my "trial" version - then update started on its own , then came back to " about" and saw this time on the bottom left : upgrade to Pro 2011 Now ! and by the side : enter a key ... so basicly i'm back at the same state that i was before to do all this .

Must say i'm disapointed but not really after uploader as i am aware that this AV  is quite - yet - impossible to crack properly ... 

May be " nightissuchproximity " you could check your "about" ina main page of comodo  and tell  what you see ? ...
